entities.name: stool
entities.description: The stool is mentioned as an object where a hat was placed. It is described as being used by someone to put something on top of it.

entities.name: wizard’s hat
entities.description: The wizard's hat is described as being patched, frayed, and extremely dirty. It is mentioned that Aunt Petunia wouldn't have let it in the house.

entities.name: Aunt Petunia
entities.description: Aunt Petunia is mentioned as someone who would not allow a certain hat into her house.

relationships.description: The stool has the wizard's hat on top of it. This is inferred from the sentence 'top of the stool she put a pointed wizard’s hat'.
